title: Strengthening CS (Customer Service) Competencies: Transformational Leadership Education for Digital Creativity Development

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can identify three or more core elements of transformational leadership and apply them to work situations.
Learners can design two or more practical strategies to enhance creative self-efficacy.
Learners can propose digital problem-solving approaches that integrate exploration and exploitation learning strategies.
Learners can implement leadership techniques that facilitate digital idea-sharing and collaboration among team members.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
